sentences.sentence: The arrange we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  is of doubtful legality.

sentences.sentence: The court will rule on the legality of the action.
sentences.translation: 法庭将裁定此举是否合法。

sentences.sentence: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.
